column1: Republicans and the Trump administration are hoping that the Supreme Court will back their extreme plans to limit access to abortion and birth control—which is why I've got a plan to protect both no matter what the Supreme Court does. Enough is enough. https://t.co/X8mqEpP66j

Amazon made over $10 billion in profits but paid $0 in federal income taxes in 2018. That won’t happen when I'm president. Use this calculator to find out how much big corporations would pay when they pay their fair share. https://t.co/90rDIRy6wc

The Trump administration wants to weaken the law that bars American companies from bribing foreign officials. That’s corruption plain and simple. I have a plan to reform our global financial system—and fight corruption at home and abroad. https://t.co/wSVyvQBvw8 https://t.co/F25ONUuXNv

It’s hard to be a small business owner especially when you have to pay much more in taxes than companies like Amazon.  My administration will fight the influence of corporate money to make our government work for the people—not giant corporations. https://t.co/QdmqpIfwJK

And we do that by investing in Black Americans and creating opportunity. The fights for social racial and economic justice belong to all of us—and when I’m president that truth will inform our policies and our actions.

For generations the federal government has prevented African Americans from building wealth and financial security. It's time for our government to acknowledge its actions and step in to make opportunity available for African American communities. https://t.co/Y9AUKDPj28

Black Wall Street was defined by the human spirit. So the community was rebuilt relatively quickly peaking in the 1940s. But it declined in the sixties and seventies because of gentrification and failure to have a systematic mentorship process in place.
In a Warren administration we will use every tool we have to defeat white nationalist violence and associated acts of terror. https://t.co/ByRE0D1hxY

The men responsible for killing hundreds of innocent African Americans committed an act of domestic terrorism but they were never held accountable. The search for the victims’ mass graves continues to this day as does the domestic terrorism threat of white nationalism.

While we can never undo this hateful act of domestic terrorism or the pain and suffering it inflicted on the Black community we all must do our part to dismantle the legacy of systemic racism and oppression that was left in its wake—and that starts with justice and opportunity.
I had the chance to visit the site of the Tulsa Race Massacre—a terrible chapter in our nation's history.

Nearly 100 years ago mobs of white residents descended on Black Wall Street in Tulsa Oklahoma ransacking Black businesses and murdering hundreds of African Americans. The Tulsa Race Massacre was one of the worst incidents of racist violence in our nation's history. https://t.co/VNZMhL5FYa

What gets you in this fight?  I want to hear from you—because I’m fighting for you as hard as I fight for my own family. Chip in $3 or whatever you can right now and I could call you soon to say thank you.   We can only do this together. https://t.co/Cs5sQGxOlJ

2020 is our chance to stand up to Big Money and make our government work for working people. In Newton Iowa @Deb4CongressNM and I spoke with voters about how a Warren administration will do just that. https://t.co/zo0qebhWPk
Let’s be clear: Our government should make health policy based on what’s good for the American people not what’s good for Donald Trump. https://t.co/pzouHItzVU
The Trump administration's cruelty knows no limits. In a Warren administration we’ll treat immigrants and refugees with dignity and respect.  https://t.co/j7bZwpPxXM

Early voting started yesterday in Minnesota and Jared and Davis camped out in the cold to cast the first votes in the state for me! It’s an honor that makes me feel deeply humbled and grateful. Of course I had to call them to say thank you! https://t.co/cXD50N135u
I stand in solidarity with everyone marching across the country today—from Florida to New York to Chicago. Together we’ll keep fighting for a more equal world. https://t.co/matUjHExVY

Our campaign is run by volunteers like Suzanne. Even if you don’t live in Iowa we’re counting on you. Join our #WarrenRoadWarriors program to help knock doors with @IAForWarren and in other early states: https://t.co/pFcvPlS7dj https://t.co/A068bqN8Im

My plan for disability rights and equality grew from the community and I'm grateful for the contributions of advocates like @MaysoonZayid. Together we can build a truly inclusive country! https://t.co/NNzmzYWltg

I’m fighting for families like Carolyn’s in Grinnell and everywhere in Iowa. Student loan debt is a crisis—and it’s why I have a plan to start canceling it for millions of Americans on day one.  What you could you do if you weren’t crushed by student loan debt? https://t.co/YdBXzdphOA

White supremacists and people with hateful ideologies of all kinds feel empowered and protected by Donald Trump. This has to stop. In a Warren administration we’ll use the full force of the Justice Department to fight this head on. https://t.co/oxZH5s2HtZ

The Iowa caucuses are on February 3—and I can’t wait.  As the people of Iowa get ready to make their voices heard follow @IAForWarren to stay up to date on the latest news from our team on the ground in Iowa. https://t.co/w7E83TTAwV

From the Trump administration to giant corporations like Amazon it’s clear: The wealthy and well-connected have too much power.  Chip in $3 to my campaign right now and let’s put power in the hands of the American people. https://t.co/pvdeoc2wr7
I don't take these endorsements lightly. I’m committed to working together to ensure that we level the playing field for the Latinx community. https://t.co/NXOiYGp2tx
@Scott_Wiener Thank you Scott! I’m grateful for your support.

I’m grateful to everyone who has given their time to knock on doors make phone calls and build the movement for big structural change. This is how we’re going to win—together.   If you’re ready to join our fight sign up to be a Road Warrior today: https://t.co/pFcvPlS7dj https://t.co/AYBPTPYYBU

A Warren administration will never suck up to those who want to take power away from working people. I’ve led the effort to end anti-worker right-to-work laws and as president I’ll make it easier to join a union. https://t.co/ryZuhfEoW8
I’m about to return this survey to the National Right to Work Committee. https://t.co/pU7mziEoWA

Decades of institutionalized racism have targeted Black and Brown communities and destroyed their families. To face our mass incarceration problem we need to prioritize rehabilitation and tackle the problem at its roots. https://t.co/0DWEZaebP5
Our broken capital punishment system has decided the fate of too many people especially people of color. We must end the death penalty in America for good. https://t.co/ItLyfU05WS

Not only are Barclays bankers flat-out wrong about my #WealthTax—they’re scared. The wealthy and the well-connected are terrified of losing their power and profits but it’s time to put power where it belongs: In the hands of working people. https://t.co/pmB8DctFc4

Student loan debt is a crisis—and it's only growing larger. This is crushing an entire generation and holding back our economy. That's why I will act on day one of my presidency to start cancelling student debt and getting relief to families. https://t.co/V5HCZzoTwo
I was born and raised in Oklahoma on the ragged edge of the middle class. I never imagined I'd be back home as a candidate for president of the United States. https://t.co/zEu8YNeNIa
Our best moments as a country are when we see a challenge clearly and mobilize to meet it head on.  When we imagine a better world and fight for it with everything we have.

If you've been waiting for your moment to get in this fight—this is it.  We need all hands on deck to knock doors make phone calls and talk to your neighbors about their plan to caucus. Text GOTC to 24477 to get started. https://t.co/EevrnEfi8v
Here's my promise to you: I'll fight for your family just as hard as I fight for my own. https://t.co/nBGhrcLZyc
Fear doesn't win.   Courage vision and hope win. https://t.co/CWVeMLyy5P

Florida voted to restore voting rights for 1.4 million of their fellow citizens—and Republicans are doing everything they can to undermine the will of the people. We must fight this voter suppression—in Florida and nationwide. https://t.co/eNYuoIxemo
I've got three older brothers—John David and Don Reed. Two of them are Republicans but we are united in our common values: Fighting for our families and our communities. https://t.co/BPXHMjb2oq
This is corruption plain and simple. And we must root it out. https://t.co/lgZyx0RTWY

These bills would cause immense harm to LGBTQ+ Floridians—especially children. I'll fight to protect LGBTQ+ youth including by passing the Equality Act banning conversion therapy nationwide and ensuring that every LGBTQ+ person gets the gender-affirming health care they need. https://t.co/W1KjedVbSY
@DanielCoronaNV Thank you @DanielCoronaNV! I’m proud to be in this fight by your side.
@NVforWarren @JoyceWoodhouse Thank you @JoyceWoodhouse! Together we’ll build a country where every child has the opportunity to thrive.
Thank you @JamiraBurley. Together I know we can build a country where everyone—not just the wealthy and the well-connected—has the opportunity to thrive. https://t.co/pVNawNxRrq
Thank you @FredTJoseph. Together we'll fight for big structural change. https://t.co/w12Y8Ri7t6
The warning signs are clear. We must take bold action now—or we will continue to break temperature records year after year. https://t.co/K1sUf7sK8m

If we want to protect access to abortion birth control and reproductive health care we must elect candidates up and down the ballot who will protect our rights. I'm proud to stand with @PPact. https://t.co/KAsBKUG9B3
I’m proud to be in this fight alongside @JulianCastro. Together we’re going to build the movement for big structural change. https://t.co/EMzh5vOMtP

The Department of Education is sitting on evidence of massive racial disparities in student debt. My administration would start canceling student loans on day one—and open a civil rights investigation into racial disparities in student debt. https://t.co/mRh98Z9uR0

Grateful for every single person’s endorsement. Your leadership during these dark times gives me hope.   My promise to you is this: I will continue learning and listening to the community and I’m in this fight with you all the way. https://t.co/XVRzIbAHSq

The president not only undermined our diplomatic relationships for his own personal political gain—he also broke the law. He must be held accountable or he will continue breaking the law and putting the country at risk. https://t.co/i3lbEYzP57

The people of Puerto Rico have shown incredible strength and resilience in the face of multiple disasters and we cannot forget or ignore their suffering. I'll fight to ensure they get the aid and resources they need to recover.

And as we fight the climate crisis I will make environmental justice a core part of our fight ensuring that communities in Puerto Rico on the front lines of this crisis receive the pre-disaster mitigation and post-disaster aid they need and deserve. https://t.co/3BE9rMnEqT
I've got a plan to provide comprehensive debt relief to Puerto Rico which will help rebuild Puerto Rico's infrastructure after these devastating natural disasters. https://t.co/72teIOtOeb

Donald Trump’s cruel indifference to Puerto Rico's suffering is only a small part of the problem. Puerto Rico is dealing with a debt crisis fueled in part by Wall Street firms that are using their desperation as just another opportunity to make a profit.
The Trump administration meanwhile has been sitting on billions of dollars of disaster aid that Congress appropriated to provide Puerto Rico with relief.
Puerto Rico was on its way to recovering from multiple devastating hurricanes—and these earthquakes are only compounding the damage to local infrastructure.

The last few weeks have been terrifying for the people of Puerto Rico. Hundreds of earthquakes have struck the area some of which have caused devastating damage. Homes have been destroyed—or are so unstable that families are afraid to sleep inside.

Lev Parnas's interview on @maddow tonight is damning. He's an associate of Trump's personal lawyer Rudy Giuliani and implicated Trump in a criminal extortion scheme. How can any Senator argue that we don't need a real trial with witnesses and documents? https://t.co/dG1KK1pUun
Despite the challenges we face I left the #DemDebate stage with a heart full of hope. This is our moment to fight for big structural change and we will build it together. https://t.co/1m40yb1FP4

Workers have been striking against Asarco's abusive labor practices for over four months. Some are taking temporary jobs to make ends meet while Asarco rakes in profits. I stand with @Teamsters @steelworkers and the other unions in their fight for fair wages. https://t.co/QH2MgMGFFG
